snippet: The expected exhumation comes four months after a television investigation raised new suspicions that the Palestinian leader Yasir Arafat had been poisoned.
abstract: Palestinian authorities are preparing to exhume body of Yasir Arafat four months after television investigation raised new suspicions that he was poisoned.
lead_paragraph: The expected exhumation comes four months after a television investigation raised new suspicions that the Palestinian leader Yasir Arafat had been poisoned.

headline.main: Palestinians Prepare to Exhume Arafat to Check for Poison
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Prepare to Exhume Arafat to Check for Poison
